data.value: You can determine the over-, well- and under-determined parameters with the total least-squares method.
Number of source and destination coordinates must match.

NAME / TTYPE        FUNCTION PARAMETERS
'euclidean'         `src, `dst`
'similarity'        `src, `dst`
'affine'            `src, `dst`
'piecewise-affine'  `src, `dst`
'projective'        `src, `dst`
'polynomial'        `src, `dst`, `order` (polynomial order,
                                          default order is 2)
Transform object containing the transformation parameters and providing access to forward and inverse transformation functions.

link.data: # warp image using the estimated transformation
# unite transformations, applied in order from left to right
